content: **pattern notes** this hat is worked in the round from the bottom up in joined rounds using the overlay mosaic crochet technique the colorwork design is created by working back loop single_crochet stitches on working rnds and front loop double_crochet stitches 2 rounds below you will never change colors within a round **skills/techniques used in this pattern ** slip stitches single and double_crochet stitches working through back and front loops working in the round working in stitches 2 rounds below reading a color chart **finished measurements ** circumference 17 19¾ 22¾ length 7¾ 8½ 9½ **materials ** premier® yarns sock kit 50% superwash merino wool 25% bamboo 25% polyamide 1 - 88oz/25g 114yds/105m and 2 - 1 75oz/50g 229yds/210m 2154-12 insomniac 1 kit **hooks & notions ** us size f-5 3 75 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle **gauge ** 24 sts x 24 rnds = 4
